content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ CIS OpenShift benchmark scanning now available October 31, 2024—Trend Vision One – Container Security now supports compliance scanning with CIS benchmarks in your Red Hat OpenShift clusters. Assess and guarantee adherence to industry-leading security standards effortlessly, enhancing your OpenShift security posture. For more information, see Compliance. Cloud Security → Container Security → Container Protection © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: CIS OpenShift benchmark scanning now available
